post:
Host Mayo is a powerful & affordable [CPanel](https://hostmayo.com/web-hosting.php) & [DirectAdmin Web Hosting](https://mayohost.com/web-hosting.php) provider since 2015. Over the span of last few years we have expanded our product range to cover all hosting products ranging from simple web hosting to enterprise level VPS and dedicated servers. We offer exceptional customer support. Our all web hosting plans come with following features:

Features of Web Hosting
*  Free SSL
*  CloudLinux
*  Multiple PHP
*  Pure SSD storage
*  Whitelabel Hosting
*  99% Uptime Guarantee
*  Private Name Servers
*  JSNode, Pearl & Ruby
*  Free cPanel Migration
*  24/7 Technical Support
*  Latest cPanel with CloudLinux
*  Softaculous - Automatic WordPress Installation
